title: I have an 60 fps cap in full screen with high end video card (ish) Help!!
body: I have been struggling with this for a while and im just startin to lose my mind. I have V sync turned off on every aspect of my computer, including in game and the drivers. For some reason league runs normally at 200 fps in windowed mode, but capped at 60 in fullscreen!!! I think its applying v sync even though i have it turned off) someone please help i have tried pretty much everything!

replies.body: If you're running Windows 10, you may be experiencing this cap due to some recent windows updates that implemented Xbox game DVR (game recording). I recommend disabling this feature entirely using [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html). Let me know if this helped.
This didn't help for me, are there any other options?
Thanks very much i had the same problem and now its solved . It worked very well ^^
Thank you so much!!! It fixed my problem. I was killing myself trying to figure it out! thanks alot!!
